elements.content: crystallographic data‡ Test setup: a single port of Infrasorb-12 has a vertical height and a diameter of 5 mm each. Sensors are focused on the sample and connected to a voltage source Keithley SourceMeter and a data acquisition module Keithley K-USB 3102. All samples were purged with nitrogen and afterwards exposed to n-butane (100%) with a flow of 20 ml min−1 per port. Prior to the integration, a linear baseline correction and further data treatment was performed. Crystal data: DUT-27: C42H48Co3N3O12, Mr = 963.65, monoclinic, C2/c, a = 27.853(6) Å, b = 16.823(3) Å, c = 20.998(4) Å, β = 116.28(3)°, V = 8822(3) Å3, Z = 8, ρ = 1.451 g cm−3, λ = 0.88561 Å, T = 293 K, θmax = 36.83°, reflections collected/unique 5540/5227, Rint = 0.038, R1 = 0.0677, wR2 = 0.1800; MOF-39(Co): C54H30Co3O14, Mr = 1079.57, orthorhombic, Pnma, a = 17.448(3) Å, b = 24.994(6) Å, c = 22.250(4) Å, V = 9703(4) Å3, Z = 4, ρ = 0.739 g cm−3, λ = 0.71073 Å, T = 20 °C, θmax = 26.0°, reflections collected/unique 71153/3936, Rint = 0.0386, R1 = 0.1031, wR2 = 0.2127; DUT-28(RT): C162H90Co11O60, Mr = 3644.58, monoclinic, C2/m, a = 32.997(7) Å, b = 39.073(8) Å, c = 27.640(6) Å, β = 123.71(3)°, V = 29642(10) Å3, Z = 2, ρ = 0.408 g cm−3, λ = 0.88561 Å, T = 293 K, θmax = 29.12°, reflections collected/unique 79642/13965, Rint = 0.03, R1 = 0.0905, wR2 = 0.2749; DUT-28(LT): C162H90Co11O60, Mr = 3644.58, monoclinic, C2/c, a = 45.386(9) Å, b = 35.904(7) Å, c = 33.184(7) Å, β = 94.91(3)°, V = 53876(19) Å3, Z = 8, ρ = 0.449 g cm−3, λ = 0.88561 Å, T = 100 K, θmax = 25.50°, reflections collected/unique 99640/18857, Rint = 0.0935, R1 = 0.0763, wR2 = 0.2133. CCDC 801199–801202 contain the supplementary crystallographic data for this communication.

crystallographic data

‡ Test setup: a single port of Infrasorb-12 has a vertical height and a diameter of 5 mm each. Sensors are focused on the sample and connected to a voltage source Keithley SourceMeter and a data acquisition module Keithley K-USB 3102. All samples were purged with nitrogen and afterwards exposed to n-butane (100%) with a flow of 20 ml min-1 per port. Prior to the integration, a linear baseline correction and further data treatment was performed. Crystal data: DUT-27: C42H48Co3N3O12, Mr = 963.65, monoclinic, C2/c, a = 27.853(6) Å, b = 16.823(3) Å, c = 20.998(4) Å, β = 116.28(3)°, V = 8822(3) Å3, Z = 8, ρ = 1.451 g cm-3, λ = 0.88561 Å, T = 293 K, θmax = 36.83°, reflections collected/unique 5540/5227, Rint = 0.038, R1 = 0.0677, wR2 = 0.1800; MOF-39(Co): C54H30Co3O14, Mr = 1079.57, orthorhombic, Pnma, a = 17.448(3) Å, b = 24.994(6) Å, c = 22.250(4) Å, V = 9703(4) Å3, Z = 4, ρ = 0.739 g cm-3, λ = 0.71073 Å, T = 20 °C, θmax = 26.0°, reflections collected/unique 71153/3936, Rint = 0.0386, R1 = 0.1031, wR2 = 0.2127; DUT-28(RT): C162H90Co11O60, Mr = 3644.58, monoclinic, C2/m, a = 32.997(7) Å, b = 39.073(8) Å, c = 27.640(6) Å, β = 123.71(3)°, V = 29642(10) Å3, Z = 2, ρ = 0.408 g cm-3, λ = 0.88561 Å, T = 293 K, θmax = 29.12°, reflections collected/unique 79642/13965, Rint = 0.03, R1 = 0.0905, wR2 = 0.2749; DUT-28(LT): C162H90Co11O60, Mr = 3644.58, monoclinic, C2/c, a = 45.386(9) Å, b = 35.904(7) Å, c = 33.184(7) Å, β = 94.91(3)°, V = 53876(19) Å3, Z = 8, ρ = 0.449 g cm-3, λ = 0.88561 Å, T = 100 K, θmax = 25.50°, reflections collected/unique 99640/18857, Rint = 0.0935, R1 = 0.0763, wR2 = 0.2133.
